main event: Oval-shaped, dull yellow lights were observed just above the horizon, changing color from red to yellow-orange to blue-green. The object hovered for 10-15 minutes and then moved off to the east.
interesting points: The object appeared to be stationary for 10-15 minutes before disappearing directly to the east.
The object was able to change the color of its light, going from red to yellow, orange, and white.
The object was first sighted above the horizon as a red glow, then changed colors as it moved.
The object disappeared below the horizon as a dull yellow light.
Multiple military personnel from the 3rd Division/1st Battalion, 75th Army were witnesses to the sighting.
witnesses: group of six enlisted military personnel
